member.name: T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmapExtensions
member.summary: Collection of draw spline extension methods for the Silverlight WriteableBitmap class.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmapExtensions.SaveToMediaLibrary(System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Saves the WriteableBitmap encoded as JPEG to the Media library using the best quality of 100.
member.param: The name of the destination file.
If true the bitmap will be saved to the camera roll, otherwise it will be written to the default saved album.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmapExtensions.SaveToMediaLibrary(System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap,System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Saves the WriteableBitmap encoded as JPEG to the Media library.
member.param: The name of the destination file.
The quality for JPEG encoding has to be in the range 0-100, where 100 is the best quality with the largest size.
If true the bitmap will be saved to the camera roll, otherwise it will be written to the default saved album.
